description:
Though Subaru managed to reclaim the fragments, her magic was lost in exchange. Subaru was shocked and bewildered, and while the five of them worried over it, they decided to work hard and enjoy the culture festival for now since there was nothing they could do.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das letzte Licht und sein Name
La dernière lueur et son nom
Saigo no Hikari to Kare no Namae
The Final Light and His Name
